feed.title: Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:54 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 08:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 0.8°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
